item.title: Fall Quarter Townhall - November 2025
item.description:
Join us for our quarterly townhall meeting where we discuss important department matters and gather your feedback!

Date: Friday, November 22, 2025
Time: 3:00 PM - 4:30 PM
Location: CSE 4140 (Zoom link provided)

Why Attend?

  • Voice concerns directly to department leadership
  • Stay informed about department decisions
  • Shape GSC programs and initiatives
  • Make your voice heard

Your participation matters! See you there.
